description: '''The Boils''' were an American [[oi!]] / [[punk rock]] band from [[Philadelphia]] officially formed in 1996. Their most popular song, "The Orange and The Black", is used after every [[Philadelphia Flyers]] win as of April 13, 2006. They have also played on the [[Warped Tour]] and toured the country with similar bands [[Oxymoron (band)|Oxymoron]] and [[the Casualties]].
